Text:
I cannot tell you what to think 
 I can remind you calm waters 
 are not always still

I cannot pick your path 
 I can promise you that 
 grief ends with grace

I cannot decide your truth 
 I can tell you hope 
 springs forth like grass

I cannot offer redemption 
 I can confess to you 
 Goddesses work with clay
THINK: Is serving others a sacrifice? Can it be about sharing?
